    @NonnullByDefault
public abstract class Gui
extends Object
implements TerminableConsumer
    A simple GUI abstraction

      • redraw

        public abstract void redraw()
        Places items on the GUI. Called when the GUI is opened. Use isFirstDraw() to determine if this is the first time redraw has been called.
